item.description:
Bring your lunch and join us at MIT for the Japanese Lunch Table! This is a casual and fun opportunity for language and cultural exchange between MIT students and affiliates and the greater MIT and Boston Japanese community. Practice your Japanese or English and make friends! Kids are welcome.

Note the new location this year: MIT building 14E-304. The street address is 160 Memorial Drive with the main entrance inside the MIT campus. 304 is the third floor conference room. You will see signs on the third floor marking 14N and 14E (different halls within building 14). It is still a short walk from Kendall/MIT T stop on the red line.

Meet up is each Wednesday during the semester from 12:30-2pm. We will provide some refreshments for the first meetup of the semester (9/22).
item.name: MIT Japanese Lunch Table
